values: （陆上，尤指乡村的）风景；景色；风光；景观；地形；地貌；横向页面布局；横幅格式；风景画；风景绘画；风景艺术；情势；形势；总体状况
进行景观设计；进行园林美化；做景观规划；从事园艺装饰工作；美化…的环境；对…做景观美化

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "...的景象和景色"

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指旅游观光的风光，包括城市景色或自然风光景色。也指人造景物或奇特的景色。
指具体的、局部的或一时的景色，可以是自然形成的，也可人工造成的。
指一个国家或某一地区的整体自然风景。
普通和词，多指从远处或高处所见的景色。
多指在内陆的自然风光。

word_group.brief_definition: 经济景观；经济格局；经济面貌
竞争格局；竞争形势；竞争局面
社会景观；社会风貌；社会风俗画

沙漠景观；沙漠园林；荒漠景观
影响景观的物体(尤指丑陋建筑物)
社会面貌；社会环境；社会风气
技术环境；技术状况；技术情况

bilingual.source: The landscape that lines the route is beautiful and dramatic.
bilingual.target: 沿途的风景既美丽又壮观。

bilingual.source: The beauty of the landscape is undoubted.
The landscape of the gobi is very unique.
He used a pencil to draw a landscape.
bilingual.target: 他用铅笔画了一幅风景画。
这片风景令人难忘地荒凉。
画家画了一幅斑驳的风景画。
她画出了一幅美丽的风景画。

bilingual.source: She used a pastel to draw the landscape.
bilingual.target: 她用蜡笔画了这幅风景画。

list.abstract: landscape（英[ˈlændskeɪp]，美[ˈlændskeɪp]），英语单词，作名词用，为风景；风光；景色。作动词用，为造景；环境美化。短语搭配有landscape history（田园风光史），例句为“The lake's landscape is bizarre and deadly.（这个湖的景观奇异而致命。）” landscape名词类近义词有scenery、view、picture。landscape为可数单词，复数形式为landscapes。
日本TV动漫「FAIRY TAIL」《妖精的尾巴》第22首片尾曲，由日本音乐团体SOLIDEMO所演唱。

yingyinNormal.en: Here Asia's three greatest rivers run side by side, creating a spectacular landscape, from alpine peaks to steamy valleys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这里，亚洲的三条最伟大的河流肩并肩的流淌着，形成了壮观的风景，有高高的山峰和云雾缭绕的山谷。

yingyinNormal.en: Across the country, over 36,000 wind turbines dot the landscape.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个国家有36000多个风力涡轮机遍布在这里。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm gonna turn it into a showpiece for my clients. Clients of what? Landscape design. Landscape design.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要把它变成样品院，向顾客展示。什么顾客？园林设计。园林设计？

yingyinNormal.en: The Chinese people aren't just good at taming the landscape to their needs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国人并不仅长于改造环境，满足自己。

yingyinNormal.en: You're gonna practice. In my fear landscape? No. In mine. You're going together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得练习。在我的恐惧空间吗？ 不是，在我的恐惧中，你也一起来。

yingyinNormal.en: Thirteen hundred years ago, the local Hani people miraculously transformed the landscape.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一千三百年前，当地哈尼族人奇迹般地将这片大地改造。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a stark landscape with one striking feature--this narrow trench that's being cut into the ground.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个荒凉的地方，没有任何特色，这种狭隘的沟渠的被削减到地面。

yingyinNormal.en: Or you can choose from bakeries, gourmet shops, and restaurants that dot our landscape from sea to shining sea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或者你可以选择面包店、食品店以及餐馆，这些商家遍布整个国家。

yingyinNormal.en: In the last 40 years, the area has been completely transformed. This is what the barren landscape looked like in the 1950s.
yingyinNormal.zh: 过去的40年里此地的面貌完全变了，这是19世纪50年代此地的样子。

yingyinNormal.en: An all-purpose peace-keeping vessel, the Yellowjacket can manage any conflict on the geopolitical landscape completely unseen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 作为一件全能型和平卫士的可穿戴物黄蜂战衣，可以应付地缘政治环境中的任何冲突而不被发现。

yingyinNormal.en: It just doesn't look like it used to. A whole new landscape is emerging, filled with new ideas, new people, and new places, like here, Chattanooga, Tennessee.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是和以前大不一样了。一幅完全不同的景象呈现出来，充满了新思想，新的人，新的地方，像这里，查特怒加，田纳西。

yingyinNormal.en: Against this ever-changing landscape, millions of Chinese still observe ancient traditions and rights, once discovering new forms of leisure and entertainment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 华夏大地，日新月异，却有很多中国人仍遵循传统与古法，也发现了休闲娱乐的新方式。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a breathtaking mystical scene that provided inspiration for the alien landscape of the Movie Avatar, a wonder of geology that draws people from all over the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有此奇景，令人屏息，是电影阿凡达中外星风貌的创作灵感，也是一个吸引世界各国人们来此的地理奇观。

yingyinNormal.en: Your journey is one through a forgotten landscape of twisting staircases and morphing castles, atop floating stones defiantly crossing an angry sea, within dimly-lit caverns cobwebbed with ruins M.C. Escher could only grasp at in a dream state.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的旅程将发生在一个被人遗忘的世界，那里满布着扭曲的阶梯和变形的城堡，你将踩着浮石去征服怒海狂涛，在昏暗的灯光下探索废墟遍地的洞穴，莫里兹·艾雪在梦中才能窥见这样的世界。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 形势; 情形; 情状
乡村风景画; 山水画

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 风景；风光；景色；景象；横幅的；风景画；局面；风景画艺术形式；局势的特征

word_family.mean: n. 陆地；国家；阳膛线；（Land）州

sense_info_list.en: an expanse of scenery that can be seen in a single view

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>landscape</highlight> is rendered less easily burnable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 景观变得不那么容易燃烧。

examination_example.sentence: The human systems and the <highlight>landscapes</highlight> we live on are linked, and the interactions go both ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类系统和我们赖以生存的景观是相互联系的，相互作用是双向的。

examination_example.sentence: Do we want instead to redirect those funds to concentrate on lower-hazard parts of the <highlight>landscape</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，我们是否希望将这些钱款转移到风险较低的领域？

sense_info_list.zh: 形势; 情形; 情状

examination_example.sentence: The BIO recently held a convention which included sessions to coach lawyers on the shifting <highlight>landscape</highlight> for patents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生物组织最近举行了一次会议，包括就不断变化的专利形势对律师进行培训。

sense_info_list.en: painting depicting an expanse of natural scenery
sense_info_list.zh: 乡村风景画; 山水画

sense_info_list.en: the distinctive features of a particular situation or intellectual activity
the landforms of a region in the aggregate

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 着陆；登陆；楼梯平台；登陆处；卸货处
n. 风景；风光；景色；景象；横幅的；风景画；局面；风景画艺术形式；局势的特征

word_family.mean: n. 陆地；国家；阳膛线；（Land）州

sense_info_list.en: an expanse of scenery that can be seen in a single view

examination_example.sentence: We can know how another person sees the universe, whose <highlight>landscapes</highlight> would otherwise have remained as unknown as any on the moon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以知道另一个人是如何看待宇宙的，否则宇宙的景观会像月球上的任何景观一样不为人知。

examination_example.sentence: We want to improve the quality of animal health and make it easier for farmers to maintain large <highlight>landscapes</highlight> where animals roam free.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望提高动物健康的质量，让农民更容易维护动物自由漫步的大片土地。

examination_example.sentence: The lake's <highlight>landscape</highlight> is bizarre and deadly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个湖的景观奇异而致命。

sense_info_list.en: the landforms of a region in the aggregate

examination_example.sentence: B) It totally destroyed the state's rural <highlight>landscape</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它彻底摧毁了该州的乡村地貌。

examination_example.sentence: We want to improve the quality of animal health and make it easier for farmers to maintain large <highlight>landscapes</highlight> where animals roam free.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望提高动物健康的质量，让农民更容易维护动物自由漫步的大片土地。

sense_info_list.zh: 形势; 情形; 情状

examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们改变了美国的面貌。

examination_example.sentence: Twenty years ago, the Urban Land Institute defined the two types of cities that dominated the US <highlight>landscape</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 20年前，城市土地研究所定义了主导美国面貌的两类城市。

sense_info_list.en: the distinctive features of a particular situation or intellectual activity

examination_example.sentence: If that weren't implied by the <highlight>landscape</highlight>—rolling green hills, sun-kissed flowers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 连绵起伏的青山、棕榈树、沐浴着阳光的鲜花，如果这些还没有暗示出这一点的话。

sense_info_list.en: the landforms of a region in the aggregate

examination_example.sentence: But what we forget about are the tens of thousands of people that tried and failed to make it in those challenging <highlight>landscapes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是我们忘记了成千上万的人，他们试图在那些充满挑战的地方生存，但是失败了。

examination_example.sentence: How are we supposed to find our way in a <highlight>landscape</highlight> this confusing?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们该如何在如此复杂的地形中找到自己的路呢?
